children.text: mātṛkā 2 is found only in ms P.

The second chapter of the mātṛkā included in Jolly's edition and translation is not to be part of the original Nāradasmṛti (see the Introduction to the text). Its translation is given in the Appendix.
yo na bhrātā na ca pitā
yo na bhrātā na ca pitā
ādhiḥ pattraṃ vikrayo vā krayo vā
ādhiḥ pattraṃ vikrayo vā krayo vā
na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā
vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam
nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti
na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā
vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam
nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti
yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram
yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram
te cen na dadyus tāṃ bhartre
te cen na dadyus tāṃ bhartre
te yad brūyur asat sad vā
te yad brūyur asat sad vā
